arts.ttl: Man Utd given GREEN LIGHT as Mudryk edges closer to Chelsea exit
arts.sum: Although Leverkusen are set to allow several stars to leave this summer, they are expected to be fairly active in regards to incomings, and they have identified Chelsea outcast Mykhailo Mudryk as a target. Man Utd have identified Boniface as one of their nine striker targets as they search for an adequate replacement for Rasmus Hojlund, and the Red Devils will be buoyed by news that the Nigerian is set to leave Bayer Leverkusen this summer.
